name: silje organic slouch hat - poppy
description:
Handknit organic wool and cotton slouch hat with flipped brim and dotted texture.

50% organic wool
50% organic cotton

Models head measurement is 22 inch (measured around where the hats brim would sit.)

Handwash in cool water, lay flat to dry.

name: air plant in organic cotton knit hanging pouch
description:
DETAILS
Small/medium sized tillandsia housed inside an organic cotton hand knit pouch that you can hang on your wall. One side of the hanging cord is seamlessly attached to the pouch while the other is slipped through a hole and knotted with a faceted antiqued brass bead on the end.


MEASUREMENTS (pouch with plant inside)
14.5 inches long, 1.25 inches wide (body of the pouch with plant inside)


CARE
Caring for an air plant is simple. They like indirect sunlight which is perfect for an indoor life and I've heard they do well with a florescent lighting as well, but have no personal experience to attest to this. You may mist your air plant, but also be sure to soak it in water every two weeks. Though they are quite hardy, if it gets neglected for a while you can sometimes revive it soaking it for several hours in water.


SHIPPING
Shipping is through Priority mail by the U.S. Postal Service.

name: trellis recycled knit headband - birch
description:
Tie back headband is hand knit with 100% recycled fiber yarn that has a distinctly cottony feel. Stays put very well due to it's knit fabric and tapered ends . Breathable and not constricting.

30% recycled nylon
27% recycled cotton
24% recycled acrylic
10% recycled silk
9% recycled linen

Hand wash in cool water, lay flat to dry.
